title: LoRA+: Efficient Low Rank Adaptation of Large Models
dot:
digraph LoRA_Paper{node[shape=box];subgraph cluster_paper_info{label="LoRA+: Efficient Low Rank Adaptation of Large Models";style=dashed;title="Paper Details"; title_node[label="Title: LoRA+ 
Authors: Soufiane Hayou, Nikhil Ghosh, Bin Yu 
Submitted: 19 Feb 2024 
Revised: 4 Jul 2024"];abstract_node[label="Abstract: 
LoRA leads to suboptimal finetuning of large models. 
Proposes LoRA+ with different learning rates for matrices A and B."];comments_node[label="Comments: 27 pages"]; title_node->abstract_node;title_node->comments_node;}subgraph cluster_lora{label="Comparison of LoRA and LoRA+";style=dotted;lora_node[label="LoRA 
(Same learning rate for A and B) 
=> Suboptimal finetuning"];lora_plus_node[label="LoRA+ 
(Different learning rates for A and B) 
=> Improved performance and speed"]; lora_node->lora_plus_node;}subgraph cluster_performance{label="Performance Improvements";style=dotted;speed_node[label="Speedup: Up to ~2X"];performance_node[label="Performance: 1-2% improvement"]; lora_plus_node->speed_node;lora_plus_node->performance_node;}subgraph cluster_contributions{label="Contributions";style=dotted;contributors_node[label="Acknowledgements: 
Simons Foundation, member institutions, contributors"]; title_node->contributors_node;}}

title: How to improve the RISC-V specification
dot:
digraph RISC_V_Specification{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box];RISC_V[label="RISC-V Specification" shape=ellipse style=filled color=lightblue];Instruction_Set_Manual[label="Instruction Set Manual
(Volume 1 & 2)" shape=box];Test_Suites[label="RISC-V Test Suites" shape=box];Sail_Model[label="Sail RISC-V Model" shape=box];Spike_Simulator[label="Spike RISC-V ISA Simulator" shape=box];Problems[label="Challenges" shape=diamond style=filled color=lightcoral];Natural_Language[label="Heavy reliance on natural language
leads to imprecision" shape=box];Configuration_Issues[label="Test suites not easily configurable
for all allowed behaviors" shape=box];Disconnected_Artifacts[label="Artifacts are disconnected
and require manual updates" shape=box];Sail_Accessibility[label="Sail model is inaccessible
for non-PL users" shape=box];Inclusion_Problems[label="Sail not included in
architecture manual" shape=box];Solutions[label="Proposed Solutions" shape=diamond style=filled color=lightgreen];Machine_Readable[label="Create machine-readable formats
(JSON/YAML/XML)" shape=box];Integrate_Sail[label="Integrate Sail into documentation
for better understanding" shape=box];Auto_Generate[label="Auto-generate code from
machine-readable data" shape=box];RISC_V->Instruction_Set_Manual;RISC_V->Test_Suites;RISC_V->Sail_Model;RISC_V->Spike_Simulator;RISC_V->Problems;Problems->Natural_Language;Problems->Configuration_Issues;Problems->Disconnected_Artifacts;Problems->Sail_Accessibility;Problems->Inclusion_Problems;RISC_V->Solutions;Solutions->Machine_Readable;Solutions->Integrate_Sail;Solutions->Auto_Generate;Conclusion[label="Conclusion:
RISC-V architecture lacks cohesion
and requires better integration
and machine-readable formats." shape=plaintext];RISC_V->Conclusion;}
